text: Sorting finances? More like endless Battle of Bannockburn...
Even heavyweights in history didn’t have life sussed out; whole empires have crumbled under poor planning! We’re all just playing it by ear mate.
Marking essays over anniversary dinners - risky business!
History departments also trend towards greater inclusivity these days.
While some subjects might be diversifying well enough, big strides still need taking elsewhere - like breaking old hierarchies rooted deep even beyond academia.
Shifts like these echo broader societal progresses; education included.
More treasure hunt than instant jackpot.
The storybook romances are grand tales but missing pages on commitment grit—it’s not all fireworks; sometimes it’s sharing an umbrella during life’s downpours.
Partnership's brewed over time - like whisky aging gracefully.
